 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפַף‎</span>] **verb** ==enclose, surround, cover== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***surround***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***side***, or ***border*** of a thing) — only **Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹפֵף עָלָיו‎</span> [[Deut.33.12|Deut 33:12]] (poem) he (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***is covering him over***, figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s sheltering Benjamin (in temple; on omission of subject see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:116»§ 116</sup>. 5. R. 3).
